data.title: Contact us – The Architects’ Journal
data.meta_description: Contact us | Architecture news, the latest building designs and essential updates for architects, from the UK’s leading professional architecture magazine.
data.text:
The Architects’ Journal

EMAP Publishing Limited

4th floor

Harmsworth House

15 Bouverie Street

London

EC4Y 8DP

Customer Services Team

For all queries regarding access to your account on architectsjournal.co.uk, or for help with the AJ online shop, please contact our customer services team (Monday to Friday 9am – 5.30pm GMT) on +44 (0)20 3953 2000 or customerservices@architectsjournal.co.uk.

Subscriptions Hotline

For all queries regarding print editions of Architects’ Journal, including change of address, change of payment details requests and back issues, please contact +44 (0)1604 828 705. Lines are open Monday to Friday (9am – 5.30pm) and Saturday (9am to 5pm) GMT. Email help@subscribe.architectsjournal.co.uk
